content.question: A rectangular loop of wire with a counterclockwise current is inserted into the coil, as shown above, and released. Which of the following best describes the resulting motion of the loop?

choices.label: It will rotate clockwise in the plane of the page.
It will rotate counterclockwise in the plane of the page.
It will rotate such that the right side of the loop will rotate out of the page.
It will rotate such that the right side of the loop will rotate into the page.

content.answer: It will rotate such that the right side of the loop will rotate out of the page.
